mapper.select: SELECT c.COUNTRY_CODE, c.KOREAN_NAME, c.COUNTRY_IMAGE, COUNT(p.PACKAGE_CODE) AS PACKAGE_COUNT FROM TB_COUNTRY_INFO c JOIN TB_PACKAGE_INFO p ON c.COUNTRY_CODE = p.COUNTRY_CODE WHERE c.COUNTRY_IMAGE IS NOT NULL AND p.ASSIGN_CODE = '2000' AND p.IS_USED = 'Y' GROUP BY c.COUNTRY_CODE, c.KOREAN_NAME, c.COUNTRY_IMAGE ORDER BY c.COUNTRY_CODE
